Hello,

you reached my motion graphics overview.
As I mentioned before already as a child I loved cartoons and animations. Around 2008 I started working with forseesense on several projects. While working on these projects I always came across problems that had to be solved by scripting. Most of the time these scripts are tiny helper tools that don't make sense to others but some of them are more. They turned into my open source scripts provided on aescripts.com. For these scripts I created demos that you can consider advertising for what they can do. Besides these videos I created several character and info graphic animations for exhibitions/science centers like the Klimahaus Bremerhaven 8° Ost, Welios® - OÖ Science Center Wels the Experimenta Heilbronn and others. Enough of that.
See my favorite moving pictures below.

Die Evolution der Sprache

Script — Ansgar Ahlers (in Coop. w. P-T.de)

Animated using a custom character rig I developed. This was before I knew duik tools existed.

These animations are all works I did with forseesense. I did the animation parts using most of the time the ingenious Duik Tools by DuDuF.

This site is generated with gh-pages, jekyll and twitter bootstrap by fabiantheblind.
Get the source files over here. Oh. I almost forgot that boring legal stuff called impressum.
